ComicInfo.Title: Slug Fest; Rocky's Birthday Surprise; The Reticent Heart
ComicInfo.Summary:
Slug Fest: Tonantz√≠n, Theo and Diana gather babosas, the slug native to Palomar, at the beach.
Rocky's Birthday Surprise: On her sixteenth birthday, Rocky enters a portal to outer space located in her niece Needra's backyard. With Fumble alongside, she goes to the planet Blotos where Fumble is kidnapped by robot hater Rongo Ragney. Rongo is defeated by Cheetah Torpedah and the duo make it back to the niece's backyard. Five months later, after having entered the portal several times the duo make one more trip but the portal closes suddenly leaving them stranded in space permanently.
The Reticent Heart: It's double flashback time as Heraclio recalls a time years earlier when after a night out on the town he and his friends gave Luba a ride back. He then recalls an even earlier time when he had a sexual encounter with the new-in-town Luba when he was fifteen years old. The result of that secret encounter being Luba's daughter Guadalupe.
